item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I am: ambient/improvising musician erstwhile radio deejay nonprofit worker occasional activist habitual researcher amateur technologist wannabe photographer athletics aficionado (people always forget this about me) dormant designer native midwesterner I use he/him pronouns. Feel free to connect through the channels listed on the Home page. I’m also happy to communicate using PGP <3 ~ Colophon This website is self-hosted on a tiny Linux computer using Hugo and Caddy.
